sql.where:
category_code = #{category_code}
AND member_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_word}, '%') OR bbs_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_word}, '%') OR bbs_contents LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_word}, '%')
AND member_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_word}, '%')
AND bbs_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_word}, '%')
AND bbs_contents LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search_word}, '%')
AND reg_date >= #{search_date1}
AND reg_date < #{search_date2} + INTERVAL 1 DAY

mapper.select: SELECT bbs.bbs_idx, bbs_title, bbs.category_code, bbs.member_id, mem.member_name, bbs.fileYN, bbs_contents, bbs.reg_date, bbs.read_cnt, bbs.modify_date FROM tbl_bbs AS bbs INNER JOIN tbl_member AS mem ON mem.member_id = bbs.member_id AND mem.status = "Y" WHERE bbs.bbs_idx = #{bbs_idx}
SELECT bbs_idx, bbs_title, category_code, fileYN, reg_date, modify_date FROM tbl_bbs WHERE category_code = #{category_code} AND bbs_idx < #{bbs_idx} ORDER BY bbs_idx DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT bbs_idx, bbs_title, category_code, fileYN, reg_date, modify_date FROM tbl_bbs WHERE category_code = #{category_code} AND bbs_idx > #{bbs_idx} ORDER BY bbs_idx ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT bbs_idx, bbs_title, category_code, member_id, fileYN, bbs_contents, reg_date, read_cnt, modify_date FROM tbl_bbs WHERE category_code = #{category_code} ORDER BY bbs_idx DESC

SELECT bbs_idx, bbs_title, category_code, bbs.member_id, mem.member_name, fileYN, bbs_contents, bbs.reg_date, read_cnt, bbs.modify_date FROM tbl_bbs AS bbs inner JOIN tbl_member AS mem ON mem.member_id = bbs.member_id AND mem.status = "Y"
ORDER BY bbs_idx DESC LIMIT #{page_skip_count}, #{page_size}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_bbs (bbs_title, category_code, member_id, fileYN, bbs_contents, reg_date, read_cnt) VALUES(#{bbs_title}, #{category_code}, #{member_id}, #{fileYN}, #{bbs_contents}, NOW(), 0)
